content.question: The religious and ethnic characteristics cited by the author have resulted in a Nigerian electoral system characterized by

choices.label: mandatory voting in national elections but not in local elections
a constitutional mandate requiring the regional rotation of the presidency
rules for presidential elections that seek to give the winner a mandate to govern
dominance of state institutions by the ethnic majority in every election

content.answer: rules for presidential elections that seek to give the winner a mandate to govern
